replies.body: Legacy or Beta? Try repairing or upgrading your client, it's either a connection or a client side issue.

no it's not. It's how low spec mode works. Low spec mode closes the client interface whilst the league application is playing to save resources. When the game is over, the stat screen will take longer to load in low spec mode because it needs to reopen the beta client to display stats. If you want to not experience this, turn off low spec mode. It was in the patch notes.
True, I didn't think of low spec mode though I was aware of that change. This is OP didn't provide any details at all, so it doesn't even have to be that, but you make a very good point thanks.
